类 DynamicCRectButton

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicObject
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicCRectButton
所有已实现的接口:
Activatable, Drawable, Focusable, Scalable
public class DynamicCRectButton extends DynamicObject implements Scalable, Focusable
The DynamicCRectButton class represents a button with dynamic motion that can be scaled and focused. It extends DynamicObject and implements Scalable and Focusable interfaces. This class encapsulates a CRectButton object and allows it to move over time according to specified motions.

  • 字段概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DynamicCRectButton

      public DynamicCRectButton()
      Constructs a default DynamicCRectButton instance with no associated CRectButton.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setCRectButton

      public void setCRectButton(CRectButton b)
      Sets the CRectButton for this dynamic button.
      参数:
      b - The CRectButton to be associated with this dynamic button.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d, long time)
      Renders the dynamic button using the provided Graphics2D object. The position of the button is updated based on the horizontal and vertical motions and the elapsed time.
      指定者:
      render 在类中 DynamicObject
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.
      time - The time in nanoseconds at which the object should be rendered.

    • getCRectButton

      public CRectButton getCRectButton()
      Returns the CRectButton object associated with this dynamic button.
      返回:
      The CRectButton object representing the button.

    • setFocused

      public void setFocused(MouseEvent e)
      Sets the focus for this button based on the mouse event. This method delegates the call to the CRectButton.setFocused(MouseEvent) method.
      指定者:
      setFocused 在接口中 Focusable
      参数:
      e - The MouseEvent indicating the mouse action.

    • scale

      public void scale(Dimension d)
      Scales the button based on the provided Dimension. This method delegates the call to the CRectButton.scale(Dimension) method.
      指定者:
      scale 在接口中 Scalable
      参数:
      d - The Dimension to scale the button by.
